rz_women_athletics::clip_card_6::goals[0: Ask- What is your favorite part of doing sports?
rz_women_athletics::text_card_3::text: When you are finished, arrange your clips below with the 'Order' button, and click 'Publish' to upload.
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_1::goals[0: Record one or two women exercising.

rz_women_athletics::title: Women's Athletics in the Park
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_0::goals[0: Show us the park where you find women engaged in athletics and sports.
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_3::goals[0: Record an interesting visual detail of the woman's exercise.
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_4::goals[0: Record the beginning of an action involved in the woman's exercise.
rz_women_athletics::text_card_0::text: How do women engage in sports in parks in your community? Show us how women are exercising and improving themselves in your area.
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_7::goals[0: Ask- Do you prefer to exercise in the park, or somewhere else?
rz_women_athletics::text_card_2::text: Feel free to ask other questions, such as: their reasons for exercising, the benefits, whether they exercise with others, or other questions you may have.
rz_women_athletics::clip_card_2::goals[0: Show how the woman feels engaged in sports.
rz_women_athletics::text_card_1::text: When your character is taking a break, as her to answer the following questions.
